state_analysis: Perfect! All files are properly newline-terminated. I can see that clean_users.csv has \r\n (CRLF) line endings, which might need to be converted to \n (LF) for consistency. Let me verify the database and do a final check to ensure everything meets the requirements.
explanation: I'll verify the database tables have the correct data, check the top_users.csv has exactly 10 rows (plus header), and ensure all numeric values are properly formatted with 2 decimal places.

commands.keystrokes: su - postgres -c "psql -d production_db -c 'SELECT username, ROUND(SUM(amount), 2) as total FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id GROUP BY username ORDER BY total DESC, username ASC LIMIT 10;'"
